item.description: Rarity Energy Mugicians Rare 40 1         70 40 60 40 Elements         Biography Gender MaleHeight 5'9"Weight 135 lbsEyes Light Green Hair Mid-Gray Skin Sunflower Gold Loyalty OverWorlders   Blazier strives to be the first to discover new lands.

item.title: Blügon
item.description: The Frozen - mysterious creatures who inhabit Glacier Plains - count Blügon as their friend Contents The Animation Appearances Rarity Energy Mugicians Rare 40 0         35 65 70 45 Elements           The Animation Appearances Blügon appears, in Perim or in Chaotic, in the following episodes:

item.title: Bodal
item.description: Bodal is an OverWorld Caretaker and the head Logistics Manager of his Tribe

item.title: Bodal, Flamedrill Researcher
item.description: Rarity Energy Mugicians Super Rare 30 1         50 20 80 30 Elements         Biography Gender MaleHeight 5'2"Weight 125 lbsEyes Dark Rose Skin Mountain Meadow Green   In the Animation, during the events of Raznus Returns, right before Raznus and Odu-Bathax accidentally burst into the OverWorld Arsenal with a small army of Mandiblors on their survivability mission to find a new homeland for the Danians — since the M’arrillians had poisoned the waters of the Mount Pillar Reservoir — Bodal and his assistant Olkiex were working in an enormous Battlegear capable of breaking the molecular bonds of any solid compound.

item.title: Borth-Majar
item.description: Brains or brawn? One can't decide... and one doesn't need to Rarity Energy Mugicians Super Rare 45 1         45 85 85 40 Elements

item.description: As the UnderWorld guardian of The Passage, Cerbie is forever vigilant against any potential invasion from the OverWorld Contents The Animation Appearances Rarity Energy Mugicians Common 60 0         50 95 25 45 Elements           The Animation Appearances Cerbie appears, in Perim or in Chaotic, in the following episodes:

item.title: Chaor
item.description: Chaor is an UnderWorld Conqueror and the Warrior ruler of the UnderWorld Tribe

item.description: Rarity Energy Mugicians Ultra Rare 65 0         80 105 45 45 Elements         Biography Gender MaleHeight 9'Weight 1175 lbsEyes Pine Green Skin Dark Steel-grey Bright red, Orange & Sunflower Yellow (flames) Loyalty UnderWorlders Enemies M'arrillians Lord van Bloot   Exiled from the UnderWorld, Chaor has lost his homeland and his throne.

item.title: H'earring, Tainted
item.description: Rarity Energy Mugicians Rare 50 1         45 65 40 50 Elements         Biography Gender MaleHeight 3'8"Weight 90 lbsEyes Royal Blue Hair Turkey Red Skin Lime Green Loyalty M'arrillians   In the Animation, during the M’arrillian Invasion, in order to maximize the effects of their plan of flooding all of Perim, the M’arrillians had to reshape part of the land by building dams in strategic Locations.

item.description: I don’t steal, I liberate lost valuables. And the only problem I have with what I do is the possibility of getting caught Rarity Energy Mugicians Uncommon 30 2         35 20 50 30 Elements

item.description: I may serve Chaor, but in time, Chaor will serve me! item.title: Lore
item.description: As a spiritual leader of the Danians, many believe this shaman may one day lead his Tribe to the Cothica Rarity Energy Mugicians Super Rare 25 3         30 35 70 30 Elements

item.title: Lyssta
item.description: Only Chaor has a better win-loss record in the UnderWorld Colosseum... and Lyssta only has one loss Rarity Energy Mugicians Ultra Rare 60 0         60 80 30 55 Elements

item.title: Magmon
item.description: Magmon is an UnderWorld Elementalist descendant of the ruler of his Tribe back in the times of Ancient Perim

item.title: Magmon, Engulfed
item.description: Rarity Energy Mugicians Rare 55 0         30 75 20 45 Elements         Biography Gender MaleHeight 9'5"Weight 1525 lbsEyes Dark reddish-orange Skin Dark brownish-grey   As long as a single coal burns, his flame can never be extinguished

item.title: Magmon, Retaliator
item.description: Rarity Energy Mugicians Super Rare 70 0         55 85 15 30 Elements         Biography Gender MaleHeight 9'5"Weight 1525 lbsEyes Dark reddish-orange Skin Dark brownish-grey Loyalty M'arrillians Temporary Allegiance Enemies M'arrillians   During the M’arrillian Invasion, Khybon, brainwashed by Phelphor, under the command of the M’arrillian Chieftain Milla’iin, started building the enormous pipes needed to flood the Lava Pond with the waters of Everrain.

item.title: Mallash
Malvadine
item.description: Malvadine is an Elite Warrior of the Mipedian Tribe.

item.title: Malvadine, The King's Herald
item.description: Rarity Energy Mugicians Ultra Rare 65 1         85 50 45 100 Elements         Biography Gender MaleHeight 8'7"Weight 388 lbsEyes Yellowish-green & Black Skin Reddish-orange Loyalty Mipedians Preferred Locations Kaizeph, the City of Elements   We shall claim this city for Mipedim as we await King Theb-saar's return!

item.title: Najarin
item.description: Najarin is an OverWorld Muge who serves Maxxor along with Intress as one of his Counsellors.

item.title: Najarin, Fluidmorphers' Foe
item.description: Rarity Energy Mugicians Ultra Rare 25 3         30 35 70 45 Elements         Biography Gender MaleHeight 8'6"Weight 225 lbsEyes Azure Blue Hair Light Platinum-Gray Skin Light Teal-Blue Loyalty OverWorlders Preferred Locations Najarin's Castle Kiru City Enemies M'arrillians   In the Animation, during the M’arrillian Invasion, really powerful Creatures entered the fray, some with much stronger innate abilities than most of the Creatures of any other Tribe.

item.title: Najarin, High Muge of the Lake
item.description: Rarity Energy Mugicians Ultra Rare 35 2         60 30 100 30 Elements         Biography Gender MaleHeight 8'6"Weight 225 lbsEyes Azure Blue Hair Light Platinum-Gray Skin Light Teal-Blue Loyalty OverWorlders Preferred Locations Najarin's Castle Kaizeph, the City of Elements   After all the marvels I've seen him perform, I still don't know the limits of Najarin's power.

item.title: Najarin, Younger
item.description: Rarity Energy Mugicians Super Rare 25 2         60 30 90 30 Elements         Biography Gender MaleHeight 8'6"Weight 225 lbsEyes Persian Green Hair Dark Yellowish-brown Skin Light Azure Blue Loyalty OverWorlders Preferred Locations Kiru Village   Little did he know then that his name would become synonymous with history itself

item.title: Narfall
item.description: The breeze suddenly died, as if all hope left the world Rarity Energy Mugicians Uncommon 50 0         45 70 45 40 Elements

item.title: Nauthilax
item.description: Nauthilax is an UnderWorld Elementalist and a maritime spy to his Tribe

item.title: Nauthilax, Aquatic Spy
item.description: Rarity Energy Mugicians Common 60 2         65 50 60 55 Elements         Biography Gender MaleHeight 6'11"Weight 273 lbsEyes Electric Blue & Fire-brick Red Skin Green Apple Loyalty UnderWorlders   Hiding impatiently, just out of sight, Nauthilax soon learned that it's hard to let others do the hard work for you

item.title: Nauthilax, Tainted
item.description: Rarity Energy Mugicians Super Rare 60 0         80 100 40 65 Elements         Biography Gender MaleHeight 6'11"Weight 273 lbsEyes Electric Blue & Fire-brick Red Skin Green Apple Loyalty M'arrillians   In the Animation, when the events of the M’arrillian Invasion effectively began, Phelphor mind-controls the Guardians of the Deepmines Vinta, Junda, Tartarek and Nauthilax himself so they could open the Doors of the Deepmines for him.

item.title: Nebres
item.description: As the three-time reigning champion of the Perim Battle Royal, Nebres is one of the few OverWorlders who has earned the respect of all Tribes, even the UnderWorlders Rarity Energy Mugicians Common 50 0         70 80 45 50 Elements

item.title: Takinom
item.description: Takinom is an UnderWorld Commander who serves Chaor as one of his Counsellors, along with Agitos.

item.title: Takinom, the Shadowknight
item.description: Rarity Energy Mugicians Ultra Rare 65 1         50 90 40 70 Elements         Biography Gender FemaleHeight 8'10"Weight 268 lbsEyes Reddish-orange Hair Dark Copper-auburn Skin Light Golden-yellow Dark Green (markings) Loyalty UnderWorlders Enemies M'arrillians   In the Animation, during the M’arrillian Invasion, Takinom becomes even more committed to her Tribe and, enraged with the M’arrillians’ ideals, comes into play the unique Shadowknight, a much more powerful, resilient and swifter Creature, regardless the heavy weight of the new full-body armour, with a different set skills and abilities.

item.title: Tangath Toborn
item.description: Tangath Toborn is a brave Warrior and wise a Strategist of the OverWorld

item.title: Tangath Toborn, In Training
item.description: Rarity Energy Mugicians Super Rare 65 2         65 70 80 30 Elements         Biography Gender MaleHeight 7'3"Weight 294 lbsEyes Pear Yellow Hair Dark Brownish-copper &Light Carmine (mane) Skin Light Copper-orange (fur) Loyalty OverWorlders Mipedians Danians Preferred Locations Kiru City Glacier Plains Preferred Battlegear Sword of Khy'at Enemies M'arrillians   Given his battle prowess and military expertise, as seen during the events of Putting the Muge in Mugic, Tangath was chosen to lead a group of OverWorld fighters to resolve a territorial strife with Prince Mudeenu and his squad of Mipedians in the neutral border between the OverWorld and the Mipedian territory.

item.title: Tangath Toborn, OverWorld General
item.description: Rarity Energy Mugicians Super Rare 60 0         55 75 95 35 Elements         Biography Gender MaleHeight 7'3"Weight 294 lbsEyes Pear Yellow Hair Red Damask, Dark Brown & Light Orangeish-yellow (mane) Skin Light Copper-orange (fur) Loyalty OverWorlders UnderWorlders Mipedians Danians Preferred Locations Kiru City Glacier Plains Preferred Battlegear Sword of Khy'at Enemies M'arrillians   During the apex of the M’arrillian Invasion, while the Ground Team formed by Aimukk, Tassanil, Malvadine, Viqtarr, Faash, Arias, Targubaj, Lyssta and Ultadur were tunnelling the Mipedian Conjurors Fivarth, Savell and Drimesse as an attempt to ambush Phelphor and his Kha’rall Fighters, Tangath Toborn led a small elite squad formed by Bierk, Shimmark, Ghatup, Frafdo and Nebres towards the Glacier Plains to put an end to the M’arrillians’ plans by destroying once and for all their heat cannon.
